name: Mental Health Care For Veterans
description: VA treats issues such as addiction, depression, anxiety, trauma, PTSD, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, and OCD. If you’re struggling with issues like PTSD, depression, grief, anger or trauma, they offer counseling and other support. All VA health care facilities offer same-day help. You may qualify even without enrolling in VA health care.

agency: San Francisco Veteran's Affairs (VA) Downtown Clinic
